amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to increase the estate tax exemption to $3 million for individuals and $6 million for couples effective Jan. 3, 2002.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Pomeroy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pomeroy amendment (A001) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 197 - 231 (Roll no. 217).
